data.text: @MacBrona Unfortunately it’s going to get a lot worse before a lot better

@LePatissier1 My business was closed completely by the government for exactly 18 months - the stress of closure was huge. Just as I’m picking back up the war happens  - which will throw us all into chaos for a long time . How much more can the world take 🤯🤯
@CarolanWill And thank you for your support 🙏🙏🙏
@LePatissier1 Resilience, the ability to adapt and overcome from problems. 👏👏 Your business/industry and other associated businesses have tried, many have succeeded but some have not.
@BrendanMcGrath8 You must be out of our current catchment 😞
@LePatissier1 Rob the only downside is we can't get home delivery of your lovely stuff any more
@AliceMilligan6 Very true… sounds like a line from the office !
@LePatissier1 You the one man that will find a way
@LePatissier1 I describe it as like being in a pinball machine, the ball obvs not the player…. The rollercoaster analogy worked for a bit, but this is now next level.
